Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring the police department to report on all criminal complaints and arrests
Items.MatterName: Requiring the police department to report on all criminal complaints and arrests.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to reporting on police department compliance with freedom of information law requests
Items.MatterName: Reporting on police department compliance with freedom of information law requests.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to access to encrypted police radio

A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring the New York city police department to provide the civilian complaint review board with direct access to officer body-warn camera footage and to establish related procedures
Items.MatterName: Requiring the New York city police department to provide the civilian complaint review board with direct access to officer body-warn camera footage and to establish related procedures.
